title.narrative: Economic Innovation Partnership Program (EIPP) with Uzbekistan

description.narrative:
Purpose of the task: To support Uzbekistan's decision-making by deriving the optimal PPP model to support effective growth of agricultural machinery manufacturing and solar panel and other parts manufacturing.
Overview of the task: 1. Defining the Uzbekistan government's fostering direction for target industries 2. Target market Analysis. 3. Plans for each target market 4. Perform Pre-F/S for each target industry 5. Education and training for each target industry and transfer of know-how.

participating-org.narrative: The Export-Import Bank of Korea(Economic Development Cooperation Fund)
